title: Activity-Centered Project Design for Strengthening Digital Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and language comprehension skills at primary/secondary education levels
context.additional_context: Learners use digital technology in daily life but lack conceptual understanding and active utilization; small groups with diverse sociocultural backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking skills during digital content creation to assess the credibility of information
Learners can utilize collaborative platforms to design communication strategies with peers and implement feedback incorporation processes
Learners can complete and present digital storytelling projects addressing social issues using personal devices

resources: Online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
